name: Skully Pinball
description: Skully Pinball is a game that reproduces the classic machines of the 90s in two different themes!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphique Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
